name: Crop Time
description:
Attempt to grow as many crops as possible within the time limit. If crops are not kept watered, they will wither and die. The more fully grown crops, and the less dead crops, the higher your score.

This game was created in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 46. All code, art, and music done by me. The theme was "keep it alive."

Tools used:
- Engine: Godot
- Art: Gimp
- Music: LMMS
- Sound effects: Sfxr
